Specimen Type: Serum or EDTA plasma (for LAMB/IGE); Serum (for SERUM assay)
Purpose: To ensure accurate and reliable analytical results for LAMB, IGE, and SERUM tests.
Container: Serum or EDTA plasma collection tubes filled completely
Equipment: Centrifuge, pipettes and tips, microplates, ELISA reader, incubators, microplate washer
